verses.name: Leviticus 14:48
verses.text: And if the priest shall come in, and look upon it, and, behold, the plague hath not spread in the house, after the house was plaistered: then the priest shall pronounce the house clean, because the plague is healed.

verses.name: Leviticus 14:49
verses.text: And he shall take to cleanse the house two birds, and cedar wood, and scarlet, and hyssop:

verses.name: Leviticus 14:50
verses.text: And he shall kill the one of the birds in an earthen vessel over running water:
